resources.string: Arithmetic-O-Mania is a math app for practising basic arithmetic skills; specifically addition, subtraction, multiplication and division skills. To enhance these skills, Arithmetic-O-Mania includes features to improve accuracy and speed of applying such skills. Elements of fun and challenge are also integrated for better user experience. Arithmetic-O-Mania can be a useful training app for improving your basic mental arithmetic skills.

This is the free version of Arithmetic-O-Mania and is supported by ads. For a nominal one-time charge, the coming pro version can be purchased which will be ad-free. The free version does not have the features/improvements planned and designed exclusively for the evolving pro version. It is highly recommended that you try out the free version first before considering buying the pro version.
Using the numeric keypad, type the answer for the current column and then click the \"Enter\" button. Do this for every column until the question has been fully answered.
Click the \"View Report\" button to view the report of your performance for this session.
Click the \"Next Question\" button to proceed to the next question.
Click the \"B\" button (orange circular icon) to borrow from the next column.
Click the \"Skip\" button to skip the current question.
Press the Back button to return to the Home screen (skipping all remaining questions, including the current one).
Press the Back button to return to the Home screen.
